alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:25PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ouray and south central Montrose Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 425 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Norwood, or 24 miles southwest of Montrose, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Ouray and south central Montrose Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
